Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:sessionConnectionIsValid:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called when a server session (not login) is started or ended.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:loginValid:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called when the server has completed its login sequence, and all is considered OK.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:sessionDisconnectedBecause:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called when the SDK instance disconnects from the server.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:sessionError:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called when there is an error in the SDK instance.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:fetchedDataItems:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called with one or more data items. Each item is a single object.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:newSecurityTokens:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is a response to a new token creation request.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:tokenAccessTest:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is a response to the count how many logins have access to a token test.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:tokenAccessTest:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is a response to the count how many logins have access to a token test.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:tokenAccessTest:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is a response to the count how many users have access to a token test.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:fastUserList:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is a response to the get a fast list of available users and IDs.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:deletedDataItems:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called with one or more data items. Each item is a single object.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:newObject:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called when a new object has been created in the system.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstance(_:baselineAutoRadiusIDs:isFinal:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called with zero or more IDs. Baseline searches are a “two-step” process, where IDs are fetched first, then objects.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstanceFinalAutoRadiusCall(_:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called when the last auto-radius call has been made.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.name: sdkInstanceOperationComplete(_:refCon:)
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html#/s.abstract: This is called when an operation is complete.

Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html.name: RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate
Protocols/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Delegate.html.abstract: This protocol needs to be applied to any class that will use the SDK. The SDK requires a delegate.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11WhiteDrago.name: beginsWith(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11WhiteDrago.abstract: This tests a string to see if a given substring is present at the start.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11WhiteDrago.name: urlEncodedString
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11WhiteDrago.abstract: The following calculated property comes from this: http://stackoverflow.com/a/27736118/879365

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11WhiteDrago.name: cleanURI(sslRequired:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11WhiteDrago.abstract: “Cleans” a URI, allowing SSL requirement to be specified.

Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST11WhiteDra.name: uniqueElements
Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST11WhiteDra.abstract: This is a primitive (old=fashioned) way to remove duplicates. It’s better to simply cast to a Set.

Extensions/String.html.name: String
Extensions/String.html.abstract: This adds various functionality to the String class.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_User.html#/s:11Whi.name: sdkLogin
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_User.html#/s:11Whi.abstract: This will have any associated login instance.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_User.html#/s:11Whi.name: loginID
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_User.html#/s:11Whi.abstract: NOTE: Although this will let anyone with write permission set the ID, it will not be accepted on the server, unless the admin also has at least read permissions for the login object.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_User.html#/s:11Whi.name: associatedLoginID
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_User.html#/s:11Whi.abstract: NOTE: Although this will let anyone with write permission set the ID, it will not be accepted on the server, unless the admin also has at least read permissions for the login object.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_User.html#/s:11Whi.name: fetchLoginInstance(refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_User.html#/s:11Whi.abstract: This method tells the SDK to fetch the associated login object.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Login.html#/s:11Wh.name: userObjectID
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Login.html#/s:11Wh.abstract: NOTE: Although this will let anyone with write permission set the ID, it will not be accepted on the server, unless the admin also has at least read permissions for the user object.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Login.html#/s:11Wh.name: changePasswordTo(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Login.html#/s:11Wh.abstract: Password changes are write-only. We can’t see existing passwords, only send a new one.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Login.html#/s:11Wh.name: convertLoginToManager(refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Login.html#/s:11Wh.abstract: This is called to convert this login to a manager.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Login.html#/s:11Wh.name: convertLoginToUser(refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Login.html#/s:11Wh.abstract: This is called to convert this login to a standard user.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html#/s:.name: unknown(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html#/s:.abstract: Unkown error. The associated value is any Error that was supplied.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html#/s:.name: connectionError(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html#/s:.abstract: There was an error in the connection between the SDK and the server.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html#/s:.name: dataError(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html#/s:.abstract: There was a problem with the data that was transferred from the server to the SDK.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html#/s:.name: operationalError(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html#/s:.abstract: There was a problem in the operation of the SDK.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Operation_Erro.name: unknown(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Operation_Erro.abstract: Unkown error. The Int contains any associated error code.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Operation_Erro.name: duplicateLoginID
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Operation_Erro.abstract: The attempted creation of a new login failed, as the ID is already taken.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Data_Errors.ht.name: unknown(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Data_Errors.ht.abstract: Unkown error. The Int contains any associated error code.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Data_Errors.ht.name: invalidData(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Data_Errors.ht.abstract: The data is not there, or in an unexpected format. The Data may contain the unexpected data.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Connection_Err.name: unknown(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Connection_Err.abstract: Unkown error. The Int contains any associated error code.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Connection_Err.name: invalidServerURI(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Connection_Err.abstract: The server URI is not valid. The String contains the invalid URI.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Connection_Err.name: invalidServer(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Connection_Err.abstract: The URI is valid, but the server is not. The string contains the URI.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/HTTPError.html#/s:.name: code
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/HTTPError.html#/s:.abstract: This is the HTTP response code for this error.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/HTTPError.html#/s:.name: description
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/HTTPError.html#/s:.abstract: This is an optional description string that can be added when instantiated. If it is given, then it will be returned in the response.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/LocationSpecificat.name: coords
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/LocationSpecificat.abstract: A lat/long coordinate (in degrees) of the location.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/LocationSpecificat.name: radiusInKm
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/LocationSpecificat.abstract: A distance (in Kilometers) within which the search will be performed.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/LocationSpecificat.name: autoRadiusThreshold
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/LocationSpecificat.abstract: An optional field with a minimum number of results.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: urlSession(_:didBecomeInvalidWithError:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is called when the the session becomes invalid for any reason.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: Element
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is the element type for the Sequence protocol.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/LocationSpecificat.name: LocationSpecification
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/LocationSpecificat.abstract: This is how we specify the location for searches.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/HTTPError.html.name: HTTPError
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/HTTPError.html.abstract: This is a quick resolver for the basic HTTP status.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/DisconnectionReaso.name: DisconnectionReason
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/DisconnectionReaso.abstract: This enum lists the various reasons that the server connection may be disconnected.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Connection_Err.name: SDK_Connection_Errors
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Connection_Err.abstract: These are the errors that may occur when we are trying to connect to the server.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Data_Errors.ht.name: SDK_Data_Errors
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Data_Errors.ht.abstract: These are the errors that may occur while we are trying to parse the data returned from the server.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Operation_Erro.name: SDK_Operation_Errors
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Operation_Erro.abstract: These are errors in the SDK operation.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html.name: SDK_Error
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK/SDK_Error.html.abstract: These are supplied in the delegate method.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: isLoggedIn
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is a computed property that will return true if the login is valid.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: isManager
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is a test to see if the currently logged-in user is a manager.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: isMainAdmin
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is a test to see if the currently logged-in user is a manager.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: isValid
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is a computed property that will return true if the server connection is valid (regardless of login status).

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: securityTokens
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: Returns an Array of Int, with the current tokens. If logged in, then this will be at least 1, and the current ID of the login. If not logged in, this will return an empty Array.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: count
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: Returns the number of data items in our cache.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: isEmpty
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: Returns true, if we have no items in our cache.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: plugins
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: Returns the Array of plugins (if the SDK is connected to a valid server).

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: autoRadiusStepSizeInKm
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: Returns the step size, in kilometers, of the auto-radius search.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This allows the instance to be treated like a simple Array.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: myLoginInfo
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is the login info for our current login. Returns nil, if not logged in.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: myUserInfo
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is the user info for our current login. Returns nil, if not logged in, or we don’t have any user info associated with the login.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: searchLocation
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is a special “settable” property with the center of a radius search.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: init(serverURI:serverSecret:delegate:loginID:password:timeout:session:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is the required default initializer.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: deleteObjects(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is called with a list of one or more objects to be deleted from the server.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: connect(loginID:password:timeout:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This will connect to the server. If login credentials are provided, then it will also log in.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: login(loginID:password:timeout:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is the standard login method.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: logout(refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is the logout method.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: flushCache()
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This simply empties our cache, forcing the next load to go out to the server.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: createUserLoginPair(loginString:name:isManager:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: Asks the server to create a user/login pair, with a blank password.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: createSecurityToken(refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: Asks the server to create a security token (no login).

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchDataItemsByIDs(_:andPlugin:withLogins:dontNukeTheLocation:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This is a general method for fetching items from the data database, by their numerical IDs.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchAllEditableUsersFromServer(refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This method fetches every user (with a login) that can be edited by the current manager instance.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchBaselineObjectsByID(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This method will initiate a fetch of all types of objects, based upon a list of IDs.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchPlaces(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This method will initiate a fetch of place objects, based upon a list of IDs.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchUsers(_:withLogins:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This method will initiate a fetch of user objects, based upon a list of IDs.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchVisibleUserIDAndNames(refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This method will initiate a fetch of user objects, based upon a list of IDs.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchThings(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This fetches thing objects from the data database server.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchThings(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This fetches thing objects from the data database server.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchLogins(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This method will initiate a fetch of login objects, based upon a list of IDs.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchLogins(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This method will initiate a fetch of login objects, based upon a list of IDs.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchMyLoginInfo(refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: We ask the server to send us our login object information.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: countWhoHasAccessToTheseSecurityTokens(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This will ask the server to inform us as to who has access to the given security token.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchIDsOfLoginsThatHaveThisToken(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This will ask the server to get all the logins that have access to provided security token.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchIDsOfUsersThatHaveThisToken(_:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This will ask the server to get all the users that have access to provided security token.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.name: fetchObjectsUsingCriteria(_:andLocation:withPlugin:refCon:)
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html#/s:11WhiteDra.abstract: This method starts a “generic” search, based upon the input given.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object/Iterator..name: next()
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object/Iterator..abstract: Simple “next” iterator method. Order is not guaranteed. This iterates the “live” object directly; not a copy.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.name: asDictionary
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.abstract: This returns keys that are the same as calculated public properties, so you can use it

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.name: readToken
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.abstract: NOTE: Although this will let anyone with write permission set the token, it will not be accepted on the server, unless the admin also has the token.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.name: writeToken
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.abstract: NOTE: Although this will let anyone with write permission set the token, it will not be accepted on the server, unless the admin also has the token.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.name: myOriginalData
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.abstract: This accesses the raw original data. READ ONLY

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.name: revert()
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.abstract: This reverts the data to the state before any changes were made.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.name: sendToServer(refCon:)
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.abstract: This handles sending our data (if necessary) to the server.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.name: Element
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.abstract: This is the element type for the Sequence protocol.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html#/s:1.abstract: We have a subscript to return values, as if we were directly accessing the data. READ ONLY.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object/Iterator..name: Iterator
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object/Iterator..abstract: This is the Sequence Iterator Struct. This iterates the “asDictionary” response. READ ONLY.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Data_Object.html.name: fetchChildrenObjects(refCon:)
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Data_Object.html.abstract: This asks the server to return all of the “children” objects. It could result in a fairly large response.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Payload.html#/s:11.name: payloadType
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Payload.html#/s:11.abstract: The payload MIME type, as a String.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Payload.html.name: RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Payload
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Payload.html.abstract: This is a special class for representing the payload as an atomic object. It encapsulates the type and the payload, as a Data object.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Data_Object.html.name: A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Data_Object
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Data_Object.html.abstract: This is a generic “data database” class, encapsulating the generic methods and data items that go with the data database.

Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html.name: A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object
Classes/A_RVP_Cocoa_SDK_Object.html.abstract: This is the fundamental base class for the various data item classes. It aggregates a bunch of generic functionality that can be applied across the board.

Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html.name: RVP_Cocoa_SDK
Classes/RVP_Cocoa_SDK.html.abstract: This class represents the public interface to the White Dragon Great Rift Valley Platform BAOBAB Server iOS SDK framework.
